name: Pagea's drop TWO letters # 3 Quiz | Drop a Letter | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's your clue for the first 10 letter word:

What you write on a cheque to prove who you are.

Now drop two letters to get an 8 letter word:

A huge female.

Now a 6 letter word:

A nap during the day.

Now a 4 letter word:

Opposite of West.

Finally a 2 letter word:

An informal way of saying thanks in England.

Repeat the process with this NEW 10 letter word:

Unsteadiness in an aeroplane.
If you're very rich he looks after you.
One of the laws in a game.
